name: Thief Lasers
description:
My first game made in unity for the 60 hours Games Factory Jam

You are a thief : thanks to an invisible rope, you will go down a huge room and claim your invisible price at the end ;-)

Use the rotations icons to the left in combination with the shapes to the right in order to pass through the lasers

I made everything except the royalty free 3d model found here : http://blender.freemovies.co.uk/modelling-session-9/
